entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:11 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
